article_title: Pocono, Lehigh Valley hospitals to merge; deal could be finalized by early 2016
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description:
The parent companies of Pocono Medical Center and Lehigh Valley Hospital have agreed to merge, the corporations announced Thursday.
The planned merger of Pocono Health System with Lehigh Valley Health Network was approved by both corporations’ boards of directors in separate meetings. The merger is expected to be finalized early next year following “due diligent” discussions of respective service delivery and financial issues, negotiation of final merger
article_metadata.author: David Pierce Pocono Record Writer
